item.title: Detective Hayseed - The Cloning Madness
item.description:
About This Game

The town of Monroe is world famous birthplace of a revolutionary technology, that enabled cloning of the human race. With the development of this technology and its wide application, the entire town is in its heyday. The production of clones in the company “DNA Revolution” takes on gigantic proportions and the dealers sell cloned celebrities and personalities all over the world. These clones act as doubles for politicians or famous artists. The world can also use the abilities and wisdom of cloned scientists, military commanders and others. The town is prospering and the standard of living is high. And at this very moment, the town is preparing for a highlight of the whole year – the cloned beauty contest. And it is the moment where crime corrupts the town’s plans. Join the crazy police detective Francis and go through countless escapades with him in this classic point & click adventure full of comedy.

  • 2D hand-drawn comic book stylized graphics, now available in widescreen 4K resolution
  • More than 50 game screens and locations and hundreds of items
  • A story full of comedy and twists
  • Stylish music and sounds
  • Game time 8-10 hours
  • Guide is available in case of getting stuck
  • Classic point & click adventure game
  • Fully dubbed in English

item.title: Troopstuck
item.description:
About This Game

Troopstuck is an RTS game with nice graphics.
In this addictive game, the player embarks on a journey to dominate the battlefield by capturing strategically placed buildings using a combination of soldiers, tanks and aircraft. The game takes place in a dynamic environment that requires tactical skill and resource management.
The player takes on the role of a commander tasked with leading his army to victory. With a variety of units at their disposal, including infantry, armored tanks and sleek fighters, they must carefully plan their approach to conquering key structures across vast and varied landscapes.
With a combination of pleasing, minimalist graphics, intuitive controls and deep strategic gameplay, this game offers an immersive experience for players looking to test their tactical acumen and dominate the battlefield.

item.title: Soul Device
item.description:
About This Game

A space shattered by failed experiments, a multitude of experimental creatures looking for you.
Leaving behind the sins that hold you captive to escape with only your soul.
to escape with only your soul!


Gameplay

Soul Device is a 2D platformer shooter with features of the roguelike genre.
On your way you will encounter various items that will strengthen you, equipment that will give you new abilities, and several weapons that will be responsible for your attacks.

There is only one goal in this game.
To pick up a gun, defeat all the enemies that stand in your way and escape at the end of it!

Game Features

1.
Tons of enemies and bullets will be aimed at you.
You need to dodge, block, and shoot to defeat them all and move on.


2.
Before you start your escape, you can customize your soul device's abilities with 6 different soul devices and 12 special glyphs to get you started!
You can have stronger combat abilities from the start, a stronger body, or more agile legs, depending on your choices.
All of this can be earned in your challenges.


3.
Enhance yourself with over 50 different items, gain multiple abilities with over 30 different pieces of equipment, and attack your enemies with over 40 different weapons!
These will make you
make you run faster, jump higher, move in new ways, block enemy attacks in more ways, and become more powerful.
Your Soul Device will change depending on which power-ups you get!


4.
Tons of different types of enemies will target you in different types of labs!
Powerful bosses will frustrate you!
You may choose to retrace your steps if you want to be more prepared to deal with the enemies ahead.
But keep in mind. If you go back the way you came, the collapsing space will attack you.
Don't give up, challenge, choose, and move on!

item.title: Onsui
item.description:
About This Game

WELCOME TO HELL.


Onsui is a half-cosy cross between physics action games and strategic puzzlers. Drop, Match and Combine imps to grow them into a larger shape and increase your score. The more space you use, the harder it gets.
You're a new intern in hell and your job is to sort out these mischevious imps.


Hold items in your offhand for later use!

REACH GREATER HIGHS


Rack up points and achieve combos of combinations to reach new high scores.

Rising Overflow Mode


A faster-paced gamemode where the floor of the box is constantly rising! Merge imps and quickly lower the floor to survive.

item.title: Block Control
item.description:
About This Game

Pink and Blue are running towards the Flag again today.
Use 7 types of blocks with various gimics to reach the flag.

In "Single" mode, there are puzzle maps that test your creativity, and control maps that need to reach the flag in time.
Don't give up until you clear all the maps!

You want to enjoy this game with your friend?
In "Double" mode, two people can play together with one screen.
Test your teamwork!

You can also create and play your own maps in "Custom" mode.
Share your map with your friend by sending map code to your friend.

If this game is difficult, read block informations in "Block Info" or learn about the game through the "Tutorial".
Enjoy the game!

-Pink Control-
Jump : W
Move : A D
Zoom : S

-Blue Control-
Jump : I
Move : J L
Zoom : K

item.title: Temple of Rust
item.description:
About This Game

Temple of Rust offers quick top-down slap, kick and sling action. Control a young outcast through random generated wastelands filled with hordes aggressive inhabitants. Utilize collectible abilities combined with your personal skill of using them. Things can get tough out there and failure will throw you back to square one!

Features:
  • Procedurally seeded levels in 5+ unique settings
  • 30+ ammo types, 16+ jump skills and 14+ special perks
  • 20+ interesting enemies
  • 4+ Boss Fights
  • Juicy combat
  • Tight and responsive controls - always stay in direct control of the action
  • Local 2-player co-op ( 2+ selectable character aesthetics )
  • Full input customization
  • 3 difficulty settings and other accessibility features
  • Tutorial to introduce the controls
  • Compact gameplay aimed at quick session bursts (approx. 30 - 60 min. per run)
  • High quality sub-pixel art at 60 FPS
  • Custom made soundtrack
  • All content handcrafted with care by a single developer

Personal:
Hi! My name is James. I made this game as a passion project and I want to continue to support it. I have done my best to ensure a stable bug-free final release and smooth gameplay. Please let me know in the community hub discussions if you run into any issues. I will do my best to help sort things out! I have put a LOT of work into this and I sincerely hope you enjoy playing it as much as I do! Thank you!

item.title: Shooting Squirrel Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

"-Ah, what a headache.... Where did the evil nut-headed bipeds come from...? What's that 🔫...? 💥 AAAAAA!"


This game is about a checkered squirrel who shoots cool weapons and parkour through levels in slo mo. Help the squirrel defeat the evil nutheads and take away their nuts. 🌰🎯
Complete the challenges and get cool prizes! 🌟

item.title: MATH IS HORROR
item.description:
About This Game

Stuck in a dilapidated asylum, unsure how you got here. You must solve increasingly complex equations to survive. But something sinister follows close behind, waiting for you to slip up and fall within its reach.

Using what knowledge you have of Mathematics, you'll have to solve problems involving: Addition, Multiplication, and Subtraction.
BEWARE: Some puzzles aren't so straight forward, you may have to use the environment.

item.title: Royal Romances: Cursed Hearts Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

A noble prince yearns for the hand of a beautiful princess. Together, they confront evil and their families, uncover dark secrets, and strive to carve out a moment for each other. Would you like to take a break from reality and spend some time as a delicate princess in a world full of magic? Life in a royal palace is not as easy as it may seem! Your formidable father organizes a deadly contest among the contenders for your heart, a stab in the back is something to be expected daily even from your dearest, and instead of grand feasts and balls, you have to settle the problems of the subjects living within and beyond the borders of your kingdom. But the result can bring luscious rewards – an undying love willing to pull a star from the high skies just for your pleasure. Will you emerge triumphant in a kingdom teeming with danger and desire? Find out in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💋 Your own choices!
Immerse yourself in a fantastical world filled with monsters, unexpected heroes, and breathtaking landscapes. The choices you make will shape the destinies of individuals and entire kingdoms, as you navigate the turbulent waters of love and power!

💋 Challenge your wits!
Put your mind to the test with intricate puzzles and enjoy soothing mini-games that offer a variety of achievements. Discover the hidden treasures of this fantasy world and keep an eye out for a plethora of collectible items that enrich your adventure!

💋 Make or Break Alliances!
Experience the challenges of governing a realm as you address the concerns of your subjects both within and beyond your borders. Will you choose diplomacy or wield power to maintain order?

💋 A Royal Fantasy Unveiled!
Step into the shoes of a delicate princess in a world brimming with magic and intrigue. Life in the royal palace is no fairy tale, with a formidable father orchestrating a deadly contest for your heart and betrayal lurking in the most unexpected places.

item.title: Endless Furry Tower Defense
item.description:
About This Game

Slaughter furries before they destroy your base! Get upgrades and climb leaderboards to be the best!
Endless Furry Tower Defense is the next level TD game with no end in sight. No "win" menu means you can only improve, unlocking upgrades and improving you kill count to be the best!

Features:
1. Online leaderboards with anti-cheat
2. Multiple levels with unlock system
3. Multiple towers and tower upgrades (Over 10 towers with 2 upgrades each)
4. Two enemy targeting modes
5. Game upgrades with an upgrade store
6. "Roguelike" gameplay loop (No winning, only getting better each time!)
7. Tons of gpu instancing and object pooling for optimal game performance!
8. Updates with new towers, levels and content

item.title: Super Sushi Roll
item.description:
About This Game


Super Sushi Roll is a 2D roll-a-ball platformer where you control platforms and launch sushi to dinner plates. Master the mechanics, mind the time limit, unlock new sushi rolls, and search for hidden collectibles! A short game with speedrunning potential.


  • Wood Kitchen - A beginner stage introducing the chopsticks and platform controls. Watch out for knives!
  • Bamboo Forest - Introduces pinball-like bumpers and trapdoors. It's easy to get lost in the forest.
  • Ink Painting - Uncover the secrets of spirits and serve ghost sushi.
  • Sky Temple - Learn the ancient ways of gravity modification in this advanced stage.


  • Classic - Choose an area and complete each level within the time limit.
  • Training - View level stats and hunt for dessert with infinite sushi.
  • Buffet Challenge - Play through each area with no extra sushi offered.
  • Dessert Challenge - Two out of three desserts are required before progressing to the next level.


  • Sushi cosmetics that require you to test your limits to unlock
  • Three desserts in each level. Can you find them all?
  • Story scrolls that unravel more about Toshi Jr's adventure.

item.title: After War Town
item.description:
About This Game

"In the heart-pounding virtual battleground of 'After War Town,' immerse yourself in a gripping shooter experience where the fate of a besieged city lies in your hands. Take on the formidable task of liberating a once-thriving metropolis now overrun by cunning terrorists, concealed amidst the crumbling ruins. With unparalleled precision, wield an arsenal of 6 distinct weapons, including the lethal Pistol, elite Sniper, and powerful MP5, as you navigate through a perilous urban landscape.

In this first-person shooter adventure, your skills will be put to the ultimate test across 10 adrenaline-fueled levels. Engage in intense gunfights that will demand every ounce of your strategic prowess and marksmanship. Outsmart your enemies, unravel a complex web of corruption, and be prepared for unexpected twists that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

The fate of the city rests on your shoulders as you strive to restore lasting peace to the chaotic streets. Are you up for the challenge? It's time to reclaim the city and emerge as the catalyst for the ultimate peace. Enter the immersive world of 'After War Town' and experience the thrill of a high-stakes battle where every decision you make shapes the destiny of the war-torn landscape."

Game features:
- 6 types of weapons(Pistol,Elite Sniper,MP5)
- Multiple levels
- First-person shooter

item.title: Rave Gazebo
item.description:
About This Game

This dance-interactive VR album contains six songs. Each song has 6 layers of pre-composed music, and when you flail with your hands the direction of the hand's movement switches to a different layer of music. Your gestures also interact with the environment, tossing out physics objects like lobsters or disco balls, or sometimes just lightning that glitches out anything it touches.

With groundbreaking visuals that take advantage of stencil shaders to create portals and glitch effects, this album abandons realism and leans into the power of Virtual Reality to create a world impossible to replicate outside of a VR headset.

There are no points in Rave Gazebo and you cannot play it wrong. There is no objective other than to play around remixing the music and interacting with the environment.

item.title: HunterX: code name T
item.description:
About This Game

"The Night of the Purple Moon has returned.
Facing the moonlight, the devil hunter Taiyo recalls a lost memory.
To hunt devils... and to find himself... he embarks on a fateful adventure through a crack in the world."

HunterX: code name T is an action adventure with fast and stylish combat.
Perfect your own fighting style using various weapon actions and magic, and explore an ever-greater world.



Forge your own path and explore an ever-greater world that straddles the past and future!
Exciting stories of your comrades, bewildering riddles, and terrifying devils await you.



Collect a variety of weapons and shape your own action style!
Experience more sophisticated and stylish combat with weapon-specific actions, dodges, guards, parries, and counterattacks.



Defeat unique devils and bosses!
Collect over 190 different items to identify enemy weaknesses and attack strategically.

item.title: Arcane Blood: The Shattered Star
item.description:
About This Game

Long ago, the first star was born.

On the night when the star was burning the brightest, any girl born under the light would be gifted the magic of the powers of the Star Goddess.

Those girls were hunted and burned for holding such immense power. All except for one who was kept hidden in the forest by her mother.

Seventeen years later... the first star has shattered scattering the chunks across the universe, one even landing in the kingdom of Lordell.

A warlock seeking great power has taken over Lordell Castle and in one final effort the prince shattered it further into eight fragments, ordering the Maidens of the First Star to hide them deep within ancient temples around the kingdom.

The last surviving witch, Verana wakes up to a voice,

"Go find the fragments. Stop him. Save me. Please."

PLAY as Verana, a young witch and master a variety of spells to slice, burn, and zap enemies in this 2D platforming adventure!

DEFEAT bosses sealed away in forgotten dungeons to claim the scattered fragments of the shattered star and restore peace to the land!

UPGRADE Verana's health and magic at Angel Maiden Statues by making hearty donations!

EXPLORE a great forest, dark caves, sandy waste, and even quaint towns!

item.title: DemonStar - Original Missions
item.description:
About This Game

After many long years, the Shareware legend DemonStar comes soaring back with new game modes, revised gameplay. Originally published in 1997, and later earning COMPUTER GAMING WORLD shareware Game of the Year 1999, DemonStar was, and still is, one of the best space shooters ever created.

- New game modes include Legacy Mode and Enhanced Mode
- 60 or 120fps
- Original Soundtrack by Bobby Prince
- New Soundtrack by Pfeffermouse
- Video/Screen improvements not available on other versions.
- Tate/vertical mode for vertical monitors

DemonStar is the most thrilling vertical scrolling shooter on the market! DemonStar takes shooters to the extreme with controller support, 3D rendered graphics, explosive sound effects, and a brilliant soundtrack. To destroy each boss, you will have to search for the many weapons such as lasers, homing missiles, and many more. As you maneuver your way through each of the 18 progressive levels, you can build up an arsenal worthy of a match against the greatest mega-boss of all time:THE DEMONSTAR

item.title: Myth of Future Dimension
item.description:
About This Game

This is a game with bankroll of less than $13,000, so don't expect too much.

This is the beginning of a series of stories, presented at its most basic with very limited resources.
There will definitely be many shortcomings, so please consider this as a 'crowdfunding'.

Different from the traditional RTS games of the past, this game tries a new RTS game design positioning:
× Complex and technically in-depth operations.
√ Easy and convenient operation with the help of AI.
× Officially designed "regular gameplay".
√ Gives players more freedom to play.
× Heavy and tense atmosphere.
√ A light-hearted and enjoyable experience.

The core gameplay is consistent with common real-time strategy games.
The game includes detailed guidance and tutorials that gradually deepen as the plot progresses.
Even if you are trying real-time strategy games for the first time, you can still adapt and master this game well.


Players will take on the heroine Yuki Usami's first-person perspective while confronting enemies to uncover little-known secrets of the real world.

High degree of freedom gameplay:


Deploy a fleet of drones controlled by AI fully automated.
As the plot collects, steals technology, upgrades armaments, and freely configures armaments to achieve different tactics.


The vanguard (hero unit) that the player controls also has a large customization space.


Similar to RPG games, each vanguard can freely assign attributes to suit different tactical needs.

Other Features:

· Simplified resource gathering, automatic turret reconstruction, and automatic unit replenishment allow players to focus more on combat.
· Smarter unit AI makes operation much easier.

Main game content:

As the "beginning of the plot" and "foreshadowing of the world view" of the series, there is only a single-player campaign, and does not support PVP.

The game is divided into three difficulty levels, allowing players to gradually adapt and become familiar with the game as the difficulty increases.
None of the three difficulties are "simple stat increases", but have corresponding "mechanical changes". Make every difficulty experience different.

A variety of level designs, including linear story missions, RPG adventure missions, attack missions, base defense missions, and challenge bosses.

About the main story:

The final plot of the main story, in Nightmare difficulty, behind the "three-tier blockade" in the enemy's core fortress. There are a few secrets about the real world hidden......

Girl's talk：

In addition to the main story, this work also contains "small talk" content between several heroines. While shaping the characters, I hope to bring more joy to players who like ACG games.

Subsequent content:

As mentioned at the beginning, the resources of this game are very limited, so only long-term bug fixes are provided for this game.
All this is just for "being able to dedicate 'good' games without being restricted by *******", so please understand.

Additional instructions:

This game contains a very small amount of "unlocalized content", which was intentionally created by the author to meet the needs of the plot and not affect the game process.

item.title: Build Master: MarsVille
item.description:
About This Game

Forge Mars, Command the Stars!

As Earth's resources dwindle, humanity has migrated to the distant planet of Mars. Now, your opportunity has arrived! In Build Master: MarsVille, you are invited to pioneer the most captivating colony on this enchanting red world. As your colony grows in scale and complexity, every decision you make will shape its destiny!

Bring Your Colony to Life

Start with the untouched canvas of Mars and build your dream city. Construct skyscrapers, parks, bridges, and other buildings. Strategically layout your structures to ensure the city's continuous development. On this harsh planet, your decisions affect life and death. Plan your buildings meticulously to boost resource production, meet citizen demands, and stimulate urban expansion.


Thriving on Mars

Collect various resources from Mars' terrain and strategically allocate them for city construction and upgrades. Trade resources with other players to enhance your colony's prosperity. Make critical financial decisions, balancing investments in the city, the military, and hero development to ensure citizen satisfaction and overall progress. The heroes, each equipped with distinctive abilities, are pivotal in ensuring the smooth operation of city management. Your city may also face attacks from extraterrestrial pirates and sandworms. When battles loom, command your heroes to defend against the invaders!


Unleash Your Engineering Genius

During the Mars construction process, you'll encounter numerous challenging gaps to bridge. Unleash your creativity and engineering talents to showcase your bridge-building skills. Each level presents breathtaking scenery and brand-new challenges. Can your carefully crafted bridges withstand the weight test and the limits of engineering expertise? Hold your breath and witness the adrenaline-pumping moments! Of course, failure is inevitable. The thrilling moments of bridge collapse or truck mishaps will provide valuable lessons and drive you to refine your skills continually.


Team Up and Battle Your Way to Victory

Establish close connections with other colonists and unite to face external threats. Exchange resources to promote mutual prosperity and coordinate attacks against common enemies. Challenge rival colonies, seize valuable resources, and immerse yourself in the thrilling excitement of interstellar warfare. Rise in the ranks and accumulate reputation and rewards. Your tactical wisdom will determine victory at crucial moments.

item.title: The 52 Fragments
item.description:
About This Game

The 52 Fragments

are an experimental, esoteric

series of games and experiences.


Beginning Nov. 1, 2023,

one fragment will be added

to the library each week for one year.


These games examine themes

related to identity, agency, perception,

and the creative process.

Fragments may change over time.

Replay is encouraged.

--


Follow the creator for behind-the-scenes content and more:

tiktok, facebook, twitter: @dorktoast

discord: discord.gg/gibgames

item.title: Fallen
item.description:
About This Game

Eson is an angel who is punished with the curse of mortality when they steal the Sky God's Amulet. Now they have to help people in Havoton, a Halloween-obsessed town, in order to survive and atone for their crime.

Play through many different and unique minigames as you help the residents of the town prepare for their Halloween festivities and other daily menial tasks. However, with the help of the Goddess of Balance, you can make some of these minigames easier! No strings attached!

Experience the game's story and customize your experiences by helping different people out and completing all of the minigames. There are multiple endings, try and collect them all!

item.title: Spellshot
item.description:
About This Game

Fend Off Hordes

Being sent off-world for munitions testing is never a great assignment. Even more so when your destination turns out to be the zombie-infested halls of Caleme Castle. Batten down the hatches or get out and use your legs, corporate doesn't care. As long as you survive long enough for them to collect enough data, they'll be happy (that is, if they even feel emotion).

Empower Your Bullets

While you are enjoying your limited stay at "Zombie Manor", you'll come across a great deal of gems. These empower your bullets, giving them all-around splendid effects such as:
  • Bone-chilling frostburn
  • Noxious gas
  • Piercing hot cinders
  • Immobilizing gunk
  • and much, much more!

Discover New Builds

There's a great deal of purchasing, selling, rerolling, and combining to get to. So what are you waiting on? Get to finding those rare item synergies and special gem combinations.

item.title: Cosmic Carnage: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game



Battle endless waves of alien spaceships. Fight against a variety of enemies with different behaviours and attack patterns



Collect EXP to level up and upgrade your ship to help you survive the onslaught. 80+ upgrades available making each run unique and interesting



With a roguelite progression system, no run is ever a fail. Gather more points and unlock new upgrades and weapons to add to the pool to create overpowered builds!



Upgrade your build by unlocking new astronauts and ships. Each astronaut has unique abilities and stats. Each ship has a unique weapon and stats. Synchronize astronauts and ships to unlock hidden synergies.



Can you survive the Cosmic Carnage?

item.title: Tru Or Die: Chiraq
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the gritty and unforgiving streets of Chicago with "Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power," a compelling hood game that puts you in the shoes of a member of the infamous Tru or Die gang. This is your chance to rise to the top in the cutthroat world of Chiraq's street gangs.

Key Features:

Gang Warfare: Immerse yourself in the intense world of Chicago's gangs, where alliances are forged and broken, and power is the ultimate currency. Your decisions will shape the destiny of Tru or Die in the heart of Chiraq.

Co-op Gameplay: Team up with friends or other players online in this co-op experience. Form alliances, strategize, and engage in epic gang battles as you work together to dominate the streets. Each player plays a crucial role in the rise to power.

10 Players Per Server: Enter a massive open-world environment with up to 10 players per server. The competition is fierce as rival gangs vie for control. Only the strongest and smartest will ascend to the top of the hierarchy.

Rise to the Top: Prove your loyalty, showcase your skills, and rise through the ranks of Tru or Die. Take on missions, control territories, and establish your dominance as you climb the ladder of the Chiraq underworld.

Note:
Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power is currently in development, and as a multiplayer co-op experience, players may encounter occasional bugs or unfinished features. The development team is hard at work to deliver a polished and immersive gaming experience. Your feedback and support during this journey are invaluable as we strive to create the ultimate hood game set in the streets of Chicago.

Get ready to navigate the dangerous streets, forge alliances, and claim your place at the top. Do you have what it takes to survive and thrive in the Streets of Power?

item.title: Dragon Bobby - The Story of a Life
item.description:
About This Game

Dragon Bobby is a uniquely beautiful game with third-person exploration and puzzles that tells the story of a man's life from birth. You control a dragon that is an analogy of this man in the story. A true reflection on life.



Explore a world with beautiful graphics. As the dragon grows, it acquires the ability to explore the world by land, water and air.



A unique game, which in parallel shows the passages of a man's life and the challenges he faces in it. The story makes us reflect on ourselves and our choices and actions.



Key features:
- Explore a world with wonderful landscapes on an exciting Journey
- Solve puzzles and collect hidden memories
- Experience the life story of Bobby, a man represented in the game by a dragon that you control.
- Stunning soundtrack by acclaimed artists
- A game based on exploration, puzzle and narrative games such as "The First Tree", "Spirit of the North", "Lost Ember" and "Journey". If you liked some of these games, you'll love "Dragon Bobby"

- This is an indie game created by a single person. I programmed, did the game design and wrote the story, while my children helped me by testing the gameplay.



ATTENTION: This game does not use any A.I. resources. All the photos used in it are royalty free and taken from sites such as Pixabay, Pexels and Unsplash.

item.title: Emerging Tactical
item.description:
About This Game

You find yourself in a small village, all your life you have been living in this safe, protected area but things are about to change... Guide your hero through the quests to train tactical medicine, or go to the Grand Medic to practice your knowledge.

Quest mode - make the story unfold through your gameplay
Question mode - swing by the Grand Medic if you want to test your skills in a multiple question manner.

item.title: Surviving with a Bat
item.description:
About This Game

You're in the role of a former professional baseball player in a post-apocalyptic city. You can only count on your good old bat to deal with the imminent infestation.

Main features:


  • A small open world for you to explore.
  • Countless character skins for you to choose from.
  • Countless enemies with fun visuals.
  • Highscore system for you to challenge yourself.
  • Immersive day and night weather system.
  • Fun and memorable sound effects.
  • Responsive controls.
  • Advanced settings for better player experience.

And more secrets to discover!

item.title: Tiny Touring Cars
item.description:
About This Game

Tiny Touring Cars is a fun, easy to pick up and play, top-down arcade racing game. Designed for you and your friends (8 players max) to have some fun racing in local multiplayer or using Steam Remote Play or for you to compete in time trials to set the best lap times Locally or on the Steam Leaderboards. Race on 9 unique tracks, in one of 3 unique cars.

Features:
- 4 Local Players from a single Keyboard.
- 8 Local Players up to 4 from one keyboard, up to from individual 8 controllers.
- Fully remappable Keys
- Steam Remote Play using (requires controllers)
- 3 Unique Cars
- 9 Unique Tracks
- In Game Fastest Lap tracking

item.title: Void Survivors
item.description:
About This Game

Void Survivors is a fast-paced action roguelike game where you have to survive relentless hordes of monsters for 20 minutes!

Unique combinations every run!

Use a huge variety of weapon types and combine them with a pool of over 120 upgrades to achieve fun and epic synergies.

Characteristics:

  • 6 different weapon types with unique gameplay!
  • Permanent Upgrades and unlockables.
  • Over 50 customizable parts inspired by beloved games!
  • Customizable Difficulty and reward bonuses.

item.title: The Case of the Serialized Killer
item.description:
About This Game

When a popular illustrator is found dead, disgraced demonologist Harold Ludicael is hired to summon her ghost. Ghosts are the one thing he can't summon, but with sharp insight, perhaps he can solve the mystery, and resurrect the most important thing:

His career.



We hope you enjoy our Edwardian-inspired visual novel with creeping monsters, summoning magic, and a cast of rich, colorful characters. It has:

  • 20,000 words/about 3 hours of playtime
  • Point and Click Investigation
  • Traditionally painted watercolor characters and locations
  • A journal which keeps track of a colorful list of suspects and lore
  • A variable set of bad endings, and one true ending, depending on which suspect you choose!

item.title: Roguenarok
item.description:
About This Game


In Battle Arena, your goal is to destroy the enemy barracks and prevent the alien hordes from destroying your own. Armed with 4 Weapons and 4 Abilities, you fight, craft item builds and synergize them along with your Tiny Viking Soldiers and your Turrets.


Embark on a war campaign against the reign of the Alien Invaders. Battle in 5 different territories and liberate your once so called home. Each battle you won unlocks a new warrior that you can play with.


Each turret can be synergized with your item build. Creating a powerful ally to help you fight against the alien invaders.


Each warrior has their own unique abilities that are either active or passive and can be synergized according to their damage type.


Warriors can wield up to four different or the same weapons at a time with upgrades.


  • 3 Game Modes: Battle Arena, Campaign, and Survival.
  • Weapon Upgrades: Upgrade your weapon and unlock more new powerful passives.
  • Special Rounds: Every battle has a special round where you must fight huge and challenging battle bosses.
  • Auto-Firing: Weapons automatically aims and fires at enemies.
  • Ability Indicator: Provides a visual representation of where Active Abilities will travel. This makes abilities easier to aim.
  • Remappable Controls: Customize your control scheme according to your preferences.



65 million years ago, in a land far, far away, the mighty viking dinosaurs roamed the continent called Norsaurus until a rude asteroid kicked them out and brought in some aliens that now parties in their homeland 24/7. Facing extinction, the surviving dinosaurs were forced to seek a fresh start in an uncharted continent called Engsaurus.

item.title: Multiworlds
item.description:
About This Game

"Multiworlds" It is a 3Dgame where the worlds are facing a problem due to a terrifying glitch that alters their environments. As the protagonist of the game, it is your responsibility to solve this immense problem. "Multiworlds" offers an immersive gaming experience without the need for virtual reality technology.

You will have the opportunity to explore multiple worlds filled with challenges, puzzles, and dangerous creatures. Collaborate with other players online to solve puzzles and attempt to repair the affected worlds. Utilize your unique abilities and strategic skills to overcome challenges and restore order and peace to these disrupted realms.

Enjoy an exciting adventure and epic challenges in a 3D world with "Multiworlds" on your computer.

item.title: Pogo3D
item.description:
About This Game

It's as easy as riding a unicycle!

Pogo3d is a technical platformer with a unique control scheme. Control your movement using only your mouse!

Learn from your mistakes and grow!

Frequent checkpoints save your progress after each obstacle. Get back into the action in less than a second.

Beat your head against a brick wall!

Experience the main story, as well as side content and even hidden areas.

Features
  • 12 Story Chapters, each featuring unique visuals and novel gameplay
  • 3 Difficulties with different rules. pick the one that's right for your skill level
  • 60 standalone balloon-popping challenges. Try to beat the developer's best times
  • Custom challenge creation & sharing tools. Hide your own balloons in ridiculous places. Share with friends for maximum hilarity!

item.title: Samurai VR
item.description:
About This Game

"A samurai has no goal, only path, and samurai's path is death"

Samurai VR allows you to become a samurai to stand as long as you can against different enemies.

From the moment you'll grab a Katana, ninjas will summon a fog of war and will be continuously attacking you with shurikens. Use the Katana to defend from them, as you can survive only three hits.

Time to time they can also throw a bomb towards you - don't try to block it with a Katana, just make a step to side or crouch to dodge it. Keep in mind - you can't move with a joystick in this game so you'll have to move yourself. Make sure you have enough space at least for one small step to the left and right to play this game.

Besides, enemy shinobis can spawn nearby, trying to attack you directly. Your goal would be to hit them first. Most of them won't survive even one hit, but not enemy Samurais. When Samurai will spawn attack him three times as quickly as possible, and don't forget to watch for shurikens and bombs!

If at a certain point you'll feel that it's too easy - don't relax too quickly as the game may become faster over time!

item.title: Tercity Life Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Tercity Life Simulator is an open-world game where you can explore a big city, make friends, start a family, find interesting jobs, buy real estate and more.

SOCIALIZING
There are hundreds of people living in the city, each with their own name, personality and hobbies. You can chat with any passerby, learn interesting stories and make new friends.

REAL ESTATE
You can buy various properties: houses, garages or even a restaurant. In your own house you can eat delicious food, relax, take a shower, and use the toilet.

CAREER
Find a job that you enjoy. Your success depends on your persistence.

START YOUR OWN BUSINESS
You can purchase a restaurant and improve it. The higher the level of your restaurant, the higher the profit. To raise the level of your restaurant, you can advertise it, hire musicians, buy decorations, improve the menu, and more.

EXPLORE THE CITY
Enjoy the views of the city while strolling through its cozy streets and parks, or take an exciting journey in your own car.

Tercity Life Simulator is a game that gives you a lot of opportunities.

item.title: Cydoku
item.description:
About This Game

Cydoku is a cyber themed, procedural generated, graphical Sudoku with over 2 million unique play-field permutations intended to challenge even the most skilled Sudoku players! In addition to standard numerical Sudoku, Cydoku includes 30 sequences of graphical iconography across 5 difficulty levels for you to conquer. Sharpen your logical thinking skills and stretch the boundaries of your memorization abilities as you journey from initiate to Cydoku mastery!

item.title: I Hate You, Please Suffer - Complete
item.description:
About This Game

I Hate You, Please Suffer is an RPG set in a world where becoming an adventurer is a common career choice, where a woman tries to get by and find happiness regardless of how screwed up the world can be. Make money and find success in any way you can: from larger scale quests with loose continuity with each other and the surrounding world, to hunting down assorted weirdos for bounties, to catching fish.

If you want a preview on what to expect, check out I Hate You, Please Suffer - Basic, a free game that's basically half of this game.

Features:

  • 10+ hours of Content(TM)
  • Up to 4 party members with lots to say
  • There's a lot of writing actually... pretend that with the title this is a playable light novel series
  • A hidden linear side-route about becoming The Best
